name: Leanne Graham
review: Authentic taste. I loved the latte. I will try more coffees from coffee paradise.

name: Ervin Howell
review: The texture, fragrance and the after taste is all classy!! This doesnâ€™t even need frothing.. simple stirring, makes it creamy and lathered.. love the taste.. some might find it too sweet or less strong.

name: Clementine Bauch
review: Authentic taste. I loved the latte. I will try more coffees from coffee paradise.

name: Patricia Lebsack
review: Taste great everytime. I ordered it online. Coffee came within 15 mins. It was hot and overall satisfied.

name: Jess Clarke
review: I really loved the cookie but their delivery was little bit late. Overall average ratings from me.

name: Chelsey Dietrich
review: Loved the taste. Their service was awful. I guess due to their extra orders in the peak hour. Overall taste was amazing. I will visit here more.

name: Dennis Schulist
review: Authentic strawberry. Strong flavour. Perfect combination. Its a new edition in their menu. But service was not quite good. I waited 35 mins. Maybe for peak hour rush.

name: Kurtis Weissnat
review: This brownie was out of the world. Loved the texture and it was soft. There was caramelized chocolate inside the brownie and ice cream on the top. Overall great. I recommend it.

name: Glenna Reichert
review: Amazing taste. Great refreshment. Their service which I got was amazing. Waited only 10 mins to get it. I strongly recommend it.
